description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Popular History of the United States from the first discovery of the western hemisphere ... to the end of the first century of the union of the States. Preceded by a sketch of the pre-historic period and the age of the mound builders. By W. C. Bryant and Sydney Howard Gay. Fully illustrated. [With a portrait.]", "Single Works" Author: BRYANT, William Cullen. Contributor: GAY, Sydney Howard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 2398.g.1.", "British Library HMNTS 9602.t.1." Volume: 02 Page: 290 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1876 Publisher: Scribner, Armstrong & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000510824 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
